text: Hagi Soli'a sondia vahera amanage huno zamasami'ne, Enketa hanimpi vuta Filistia vahera hara ome hu'nezmantamanenkeno masa huno feruseno. Hagi magore huta ozamtregahunanki zamahe vagaregahune, hige'za sondia vahe'mo'za amanage hu'naze, Nazano huzmante'naku'ma hanana zana amane hugahane. Hianagi pristi ne'mo'a kenona huno, amare Anumzamofona antahigeta kesune.
